page.original:
TABLE.NAME_NORMALIZE() Syntax Normalized_Name as C = TABLE.NAME_NORMALIZE( Filename as C ) ArgumentDescription FilenameThe filename of a table or set.
Description The TABLE.NAME_NORMALIZE() method returns the normalized version of a table or set name. Example ? table.name_normalize("c:\databases\CUSTOMER.DBF") = "c_databases_CUSTOMER_DBF"
See Also Table Functions and Methods
